thread.title: Several bowlers flirt with perfection at Galaxy
thread.title_full: Several bowlers flirt with perfection at Galaxy

author: Stanley Stamper, Register Bowling Columnist
title: Several bowlers flirt with perfection at Galaxy
text:
Several bowlers flirt with perfection at Galaxy By Stanley Stamper, Register Bowling Columnist Richmond Register 
One woman and two men nearly scored a perfect game at Galaxy this past week. 
Haley Hardy (289), David Norman (287), and Brandon Simpson (287) were nearly perfect, however, just came up a little short of the perfect score of 300. 
David Norman had the top series (743) at Galaxy last week. 
League highlights 
Top Men’s Games — David Norman (287), Kenny Smith (269) and Donnie Philbeck (264). 
Top Men’s Series — David Norman (743), Neil Haggard (704) and Brandon Simpson (694). 
Top Women’s Games — Haley Hardy (289), Narita Rose (238) and Miranda Reffitt (215). 
Top Women’s Series — Haley Hardy (690), Narita Rose (614), Miranda Reffitt (556). 
Galaxy Girls 
Top Women’s Games — Marget Tilsley (192), Pam Bennett (189) and Donna Fourre (183). 
Top Women’s Series — Evelyn Mullins (527), Margaret Tilsley (513) and Alice Faulkner (502). 
Arlington 
Top Women’s Games — Bridgett Settles (193), Connie Bowlin (186) and Gail Campbell (181). 
Top Women’s Series — Bridgett Settles (516), Gail Campbell (506) and Karen Kensicki (479). 
Tuesday Night No-Tap 
Top Men’s Games — Mike McFerron (300), Lynn Estes (284) and Kyle Schultz (261). 
Top Men’s Series — Lynn Estes (776), Kyle Schultz (694) and Jim Anderson (598). 
Top Women’s Games — April Brumfield (234), Meg Adkins (200) and Teresa Reed (178). 
Top Women’s Series — April Brumfield (607), Meg Adkins (493) and Teresa Reed (483). 
Wednesday Wonders 
Top Men’s Games — Lewis Jones Jr. (257), Kevin Exum (246) and David Norman (233). 
Top Men’s Series — Lewis Jones Jr. (708), Kevin Exum (669) and Carl Daniels (586). 
Top Women’s Games — LuAnn Bryant (168), Pat Holtzclaw (167) and Teresa Jackson (157). 
Top Women’s Series — LuAnn Bryant (457), Pat Holtzclaw (455) and Teresa Jackson (397). 
Fall Classic Doubles 
Top Men’s Games — David Robinson (238), Mike Huser (216) and Ron Roberts (196). 
Top Men’s Series — David Robinson (584), Ron Roberts (572) and Mike Huser (556). 
Top Women’s Games — Beverly Shearer (179), Pam Bennett (177) and Mary Taylor (176). 
Top Women’s Series — Beverly Shearer (511), Pam Bennett (506) and Mary Taylor (464). 
TGIF 
Top Men’s Games — Brandon Simpson (287), Lewis Jones Jr. (249), Mark Rogers (237) and Kenny Smith (237) 
Top Men’s Series — Brandon Simpson (715), Lewis Jones Jr. (679) and Mark Rogers (654). 
Top Women’s Games — Narita Rose (224), Sandy Reynolds (206) and Kymmi Bowles (180). 
Top Women’s Series — Narita Rose (570), Sandy Reynolds (530) and Pat Harris (510). 
Upcoming events 
October 10 and 11 — Kentucky State Bowling Association's Annual State Seniors Tournament will be held in Richmond at Galaxy Bowling Center. There will be two sessions each day at 1 and 4 p.m. (No Monte Carlo Bowling this weekend due to the State Tournament) 
A Monte Carlo Tournament will be held at Galaxy every Sunday at 6:00 PM. 
More information on the tournament available at the front desk at Galaxy.
